item.title: My Reading List
item.description: Currently Reading Coming Soon. Engineering Books Computer Networks: A Systems Approach (The Morgan Kaufmann Series in Networking) | Online - It explores the key principles of computer networking, using real world examples from network and protocol design. Optical Springer Handbook of Optical Networks - This is a in-depth book on optical networking for all types of deployment. This is a bible. You have to use this as reference book. As of now, I have concentrated on the data center networking and its related chapters.
